üß† About FlashQuizApp

‚ú® What is FlashQuizApp?

FlashQuizApp is a smart, gamified flashcard builder for mastering anything ‚Äî from coding to history to life skills. Create your own decks, test your memory, and track your progress with accuracy-based unlocks and level-ups.

üéÆ How to Use

  • Create cards with questions (front) and answers (back).
  • Assign each card a suit and rank to unlock via quiz mode.
  • Use the Test Mode to challenge yourself and unlock harder cards.
